topics.body:
Better call the nsa, cause I think we have a better interrogation technique for insurgents:
Make them watch foodfight, the twilight series, 100 million years bc, highlander 1 & 2, league of Extraordinary Gentlemen, the 2011 three musketeers movie, jack and jill and tape their eyes open and apply eye drops so they can't close their eyes and have to watch through all of them.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body: We should make a bad movie movie marathon consisting of The Room, Shyamalan's TLA, Birdemic, Highlander, Twilight, and Foodfight. Then bet people to sit through it with $100 as a reward.
topics.author: 4fded3ad945b700aaa01381d

topics.body:
Is it bad I actually liked League of Extraordinary Gentleman?

Though they SHOULD have just adapted the comic.

I feel deep sadness the greatness of Mr. Hyde pulling down a martian tripod and eating the alien inside will never make it to screen.
topics.author: 500757fd7f123b75a90003b1

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5355ffe56368725eba2a0300#post_5355ffe56368725eba2


That would make physical and psychological torture viable options to substract information, but I give it 2 months tops before human rights start to try to take it down and demand that anyone who does that to be prosecuted for illegal war crimes and they get banned. And I fail to see why that would be a bad thing.
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/535600cc6368725eba9f0300#post_535600cc6368725eba9f0300
I'm with you on that. Its enjoyable as a dumb popcorn movie, but I'd kill to see it done better, preferably with a hard R.

It helps that I'm not terribly enamored of the comics. Don't get me wrong, I like Alan Moore's work. V for Vendetta is one of my all time favorite comics, From Hell is brilliant and Watchmen is a goddamn masterpiece but something about the comic version of League just rubs me the wrong way, I think its that aside from Quartermain I'm a big fan of a lot of the other stuff he uses the characters from and don't particularly appreciate his takes on them.
